abstract: Federal government reports deaths from drug overdoses rose 6 percent in 2013 from 2012.
lead_paragraph: Deaths from drug overdoses rose by 6 percent in 2013 from 2012, the federal government said Monday.
snippet: Deaths from drug overdoses rose by 6 percent in 2013 from 2012, the federal government said Monday.

headline.main: After Stabilizing, Overdose Deaths Rose in 2013
headline.print_headline: After Stabilizing, Overdose Deaths Rose in 2013
